name: Cyber Sentinel
description: Experience the hacker's side of cyberpunk in Cyber Sentinel! This design-based puzzle game features a complete visual programming kit for designing your own viruses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Programmer's/Turing Machine Sokoban, and I'm a sucker for anything Sokoban-like with unusual motifs. Hoping for more add-on levels and workshop support in the future.  Also featuring an opening cut scene featuring the most accurate snoring noises in a game ever. Don't challenge me on this.
